MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW9 postcode area of Northwich affecting properties in Main Road , Chapel Street and the surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6:38am. Our engineers are on site to investigate and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9:45am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7.57am on 31st of Dec 2020.
